_id.description: The unique notebook ID which should start with `book:` and the remains are randomly generated string

_rev.description: This is a CouchDB specific field. The current MVCC-token/revision of this document (mandatory and immutable)

updatedAt.description: The date time when the notebook was last updated, represented with Unix timestamps in milliseconds

createdAt.description: The date time when the notebook was created, represented with Unix timestamps in milliseconds

count.description: It indicates the number of notes in the notebook

parentBookId.description: The ID of the parent notebook
